page.title: 12CLUBS
page.content: Variety -- for young and old in Braunstone. The Civic Centre is a community centre shared and used by many clubs in our area. These clubs are affliliated to the Centre -{Age {Concern,badminton,Braunstone Sports {Association,Swimming club,Friends of {the Centre,Friends of Loros (a {charity),Kingsway Social {club,Leicestershire Cyclists {association,Photographic Society,Magic {Circle,Life,Monday Club,Mother and {Baby club, Wednesday welcome {club,Tonwswomens Guild,Thursday over {60's,Yoga,Whist,Trinity Youth F.C.. There are also many sprots clubs which play on the various parks in our area. These include bowling,tennis,football (6 clubs),rugby,hockey,cricket and jogging.
